Detailed Description

Provides generic methods for TableGroup management for any databases.

Definition at line 36 of file TableGroupInterface.php.

Member Function Documentation

TableGroupInterface::FindGroupsByName (  $  groupName  ) 
 

Selects the Group-s from table which TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME looks like $groupName.

Parameters:
$groupName the name of the Group to select. It can contain magic chars like BDD_SEEK_MULTICHARS and BDD_SEEK_ANYCHAR where BDD represent your database type. Please refer to your database documentation.
Returns:
- a Groups object : the Group-s which TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_NAME looks like $groupName in case of success

- an Errors object in case of error(s) : see BDDConnection::Query

Implemented in MySQLTableGroup.

TableGroupInterface::IdGroupExists (  $  idGroup  ) 
 

Checks whether the Group of id $idGroup exists or not.

Parameters:
$idGroup The TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_IDGROUP of the group to be checked.
Returns:
- true if group exists

- false otherwise

Implemented in MySQLTableGroup.

TableGroupInterface::InsertGroup (  Group $  group  ) 
 

Inserts the given Group $group into the table.

Parameters:
$group The Group to be inserted
Returns:
- NULL if operation was successful

- an Errors object in case of Error-s see BDDConnection::Query

Implemented in MySQLTableGroup.

TableGroupInterface::SaveGroups (  Groups $  groups  ) 
 

Updates validated items in $groups in function of its idGroup. If idGroup doesn't exist, item is inserted. If an item of $groups hasn't been validate, it is skipped.

Parameters:
$groups a Groups of items to be updated/inserted
Returns:
- NULL in case of success

- an Errors object in case of error(s) : see BDDConnection::Query

Implemented in MySQLTableGroup.

TableGroupInterface::SelectGroupByIdGroup (  $  idGroup  ) 
 

Selects the Group from table which TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_IDGROUP equals to $idGroup.

Parameters:
$idGroup the id of the Group to select
Returns:
- the Group which TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_IDGROUP equals to $idGroup in case of success

- an Errors object in case of error(s) : see BDDConnection::Query

Implemented in MySQLTableGroup.

TableGroupInterface::SelectGroups (   ) 
 

Selects all the Group-s from Table.

Returns:
- a list of Group-s in a Groups object in case of success

- an Errors object in case of error(s) : see BDDConnection::Query

Implemented in MySQLTableGroup.

TableGroupInterface::SelectGroupsByIdSite (  $  idSite  ) 
 

Selects the Group-s from table which TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE equals to $idSite. In other words : Group-s that belong to the site of id $idSite

Parameters:
$idSite the id of the Site the Group may belong
Returns:
- A Groups of Group-s which TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_IDSITE equals to $idSite in case of success

- an Errors object in case of error(s) : see BDDConnection::Query

Implemented in MySQLTableGroup.

TableGroupInterface::UpdateGroupByIdGroup (  Group $  updatedGroup  ) 
 

Tries to update the given group $updatedGroup in function of its property TableGroup::TABLE_COLUMN_IDGROUP.

Parameters:
$updatedGroup The Group to be updated
Returns:
- NULL if operation was successful

- an Errors object in case of Error-s see BDDConnection::Query

Implemented in MySQLTableGroup.
